articles.title: Musk decides to bury dead Twitter accounts, warns users follower counts could sink - The Register
articles.description: Why do this? Freeing up abandoned handles is 'important'
articles.content:
Twitter will begin purging inactive accounts, owner Elon Musk has said, but the specifics are anyone's guess.
